Container.Name: EPlusTV
Container.Overview:
This takes ESPN+, ESPN, FOX Sports, and MLB.tv events, and transforms them into a "live TV" experience with virtual linear channels. It will discover what is on, and generate a schedule of channels that will give you M3U and XMLTV files that you can import into something like Jellyfin, ChannelsDVR, or xTeVe.
=== Notes === * This was not made for pirating streams. This is made for using your own credentials and have a different presentation than the ESPN, FOX Sports, and MLB.tv apps currently provide. * The Mouse might not like it and it could be taken down at any minute. Enjoy it while it lasts. ¯\\(ツ)/¯

Config.Name: HTTP Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8000

Config.Name: App Config
Config.Description: Container Path: /app/config

Config.Name: Start Channel
Config.Description: If nothing is input, it will default to Channel 1.

Config.Name: Max Stream Resolution
Config.Description: Max resolution to use. Valid options are `UHD/HDR`, `UHD/SDR`, `1080p`, `720p`, and `540p` (Some providers don't offer 4K or 1080p and will attempt to play the highest framerate available for selected resolution).

Config.Name: Number of Channels
Config.Description: How many channels to create? This is dependent on the networks you are using. A good number to start with is > 100 if you are using ESPN+.

Config.Name: Dedicated Linear Channels?
Config.Description: If you are using linear channels like ESPN, FS1, ect., and want those events on their own dedicated channels

Config.Name: Proxy Segments?
Config.Description: Proxy keyed `*.ts` files
